    <script type="text/javascript">
     $boat(document).ready(function(){
     // gallery expandable
     $boat('.listing.expandable a:gt(5)').hide();
     $boat('.btn.contract').hide();
     $boat('.btn.expand').click(function() {
       $boat('.listing.expandable a').not(':visible').each( function() {
         $boat(this).addClass('ShowGallery');
         $boat('.btn.expand').hide();
         $boat('.btn.contract').show();
       });
     });
     $boat('.btn.contract').click(function() {
       $boat('.listing.expandable a:gt(3)').removeClass('ShowGallery');
       $boat('.btn.contract').hide();
       $boat('.btn.expand').show();
     }); 
     // Bootstrap Carousel
     $boat('.carousel').carousel({
       interval: 5000
     });  
     $boat('.gallerybox').magnificPopup({
       delegate: 'a',
       type: 'image',
       gallery: {
         enabled: true
       }
     });
     //Match Height JS
     $boat(function() {
       $boat('.matchheight').matchHeight();
     });
     $boat(".backtotop .item").hide();
     $boat(function () {
       $boat(window).scroll(function(){
         if ($boat(window).scrollTop()>100){
           $boat(".backtotop .item").fadeIn(1500);
         }
         else{
           $boat(".backtotop .item").fadeOut(1500);
         }
       });
       $boat(".backtotop").click(function(){
         $boat('body,html').animate({scrollTop:0},1000);
         return false;
       });
     });
   });
    </script>
